text: Developed a Functional Monitoring framework, to be utilized by 25+ services to log events on Splunk.

children.text: Also, designed a Splunk dashboard to visualize the important KPIs through various graphs and charts.

text: Technical Owner of a framework that detects, identifies and fixes seat discrepancies between systems

children.text: Mentoring an Internship to perform Cloud Migration of the tool to Azure
Handled and resolved production outages faced by the framework impacting 30+ customers directly
Developed a tool for monitoring the framework and extracting data for KPIs

text: Independently facilitated implementation of features and configuration enhancements for 80+ customers

children.text: Automated the activity by developing a tool reducing manual efforts by 68%

text: Code optimization to increase performance by reducing redundancy
